name: Space Ops Arcade
description:
In 2020, an exoplanet similar to planet earth was discovered, named "Kepler-1649c", located 301 light-years away from our planet. 

Twenty years later, technology developed incredibly fast as it never did before, but the earth's life has deteriorated so much is almost inhabitable.

The search for a planet to colonize has been going on for years.

A selected team of special soldiers has been genetically modified to be classified as "Super Humans" and is now known as "Space Operational Force", for short the Space Ops.

The Space Ops was assigned the mission to scout Kepler-1649c and supervise the Colonization of the planet.

An update with major changes is currently in development.

Stay in touch and give your feedback by joining the official discord: https://discord.gg/pzRDBKXMZu

Please support the Kickstarter to get the game on Steam! Sharing also helps! Click Here
